verses.1: Tua ciangin huihpi lak panin Topa in Job tungah thu hong gen a,
verses.2: “Keiʼ pilna a nial dingin nang kua na hi hiam? Thu na theih loh lam a kilangsak na hi bek hi.
verses.3: Kipasalsakin ding to inla, kong thudot dingte hong dawng in.
verses.4: Leitung ka bawl laitakin nang om na hi hiam? Thei kisa na hih leh tua thu hong gen in.
verses.5: Bang cia-in golsak ding cih kua in seh ahi hiam? Kua in a golna ding zah khau khai ahi hiam? Hihte khempeuh thei kisa na hi hiam?
verses.6: Leitung a pua khuampite bang tungah kiphut ahi hiam? Kua in leitung a bulpi phut ahi hiam?
verses.7: Tua ni-in zingsang aksite in la sa khawm uh a, Pasianʼ tapate lungdamin a kiko uh hi.
verses.8: “Lei sung panin tuipi hong suahkhiat laitakin, tua tuipi a khaktan ding kongpi kua in na khak ahi hiam?
verses.9: Meii tawh tuipi a tuamcip pa, khuamial tawh a vialcip pa keimah ka hi hi.
verses.10: Tuipi gamgi ding ciamteh sakin, ama huang sung ding bekah ka omsak hi.
verses.11: Tuipi kiangah, ‘Hih ciang bek na pai dinga, hih banah na kin nawn kei ding hi. Na tuihualte hih ciang bek pai ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
verses.12: Job aw, nangmah in, ‘Tu ni-in khua vak in,’ ci-in na nuntak sung tawntung thu pia ngei na hi hiam?
verses.13: Zing khuavak in leitung a mongin manin, a kawm a bu migilote a sinkhiat ding, thu pia thei ngei na hi hiam?
verses.14: Khuavak in mualleguamte kilangkhiasak a, puan a tonin a kikoih tawh a kibatna a kilangsak hi.
verses.15: Migilote adingin sun khuavak taang lua a, siatna a gamtat nading uh a khamcip hi.
verses.16: “Tuipi sung tawng tuinak ah pai ngei na hi hiam? Tuipi nuai lei tam tungah lam pai ngei na hi hiam?
verses.17: Misiteʼ gam khuamial kongkhakpi, mi khatpeuh in nang hong lak ngei ahi hiam?
verses.18: Leitung bangcia lian ding cih na thei hiam? Hih thute thei na hih leh hong dawng in.
verses.19: “Leitung khuavak hong kipat khiatna mun ahi a, leitung khuamial hong kipatna mun ahi zongin, thei na hi hiam?
verses.20: Nangmah in amauʼ omna mun ciang dong va thei a, tua ciang dongah va khakik ngei na hi hiam?
verses.21: Na nuntakna sawt ta a, leitung a pianin nang suak khin na hih teh tua thute khempeuh thei mah ni teh!
verses.22: “Vuk a kikoihna munah nang va lut ngei a, gial a kikhopna mun va mu ngei na hi hiam?
verses.23: Tuate, lungkham hun ading, gal om hun cianga dingin ka koihcing ahi hi.
verses.24: Leitung nitaang a hong suah khiatna mun ahi a, nisuahna huihpi hong kipatna mun ahi zongin, va tung ngei na hi hiam?
verses.25: “Kua in guahzukna ding tui lampi bawlsak a, keekʼ lampi ding sialsak ahi hiam?
verses.26: Mihing om lohna mun leilak ah, kua in guah zusak ahi hiam?
verses.27: Lopate a po theih nadingin lei keu-in a sak bekbakte kua in tui buak ahi hiam?
verses.28: Guah in pa nei ahi hiam? Daitui in pa nei ahi hiam?
verses.29: Kuaʼ sung panin tuikhal hong piang khia a, kuaʼ sung panin van a vukte hong suak ahi hiam?
verses.30: Tua tuite suang bangin sak a, tuipi tui teng khalcip hi.
verses.31: “Van a om Seguk henkop thei a, Zawlzawng a kikhihna phel thei na hi hiam?
verses.32: Ama hunhunin aksite lam lak thei a, Khawlei-uikai a pai nading lampi lak thei na hi hiam?
verses.33: Van a om nateʼ zuih ding ngeina bawlsak thei a, lei-a om nateʼ zuih ding ngeina bawl thei na hi hiam?
verses.34: “Van a om meiite in guah hong zuksak nading nangmah in sawl na hi hiam?
verses.35: ‘Khua phia in,’ ci-in thu pia lecin, ‘Nong sawl bangin phia ning,’ hong ci ding ahi hiam?
verses.36: Nail gun a khan ding a thei gunvapite kua in hilh a, guahzuk ding a thei akluite, kua in hilh ahi hiam?
verses.37: Leivuite khalcipin, leitang a sak ciangin, meiite thu pia-in van a tuibeemte a hong dingin kua in pilna nei ahi hiam?
verses.39: “Humpinelkai le a note leihawm sungah bu-in, a kua sung uh ah lumin ngakin a om laitakun, a an ding uh zonsak thei a, a noteʼ gilkialna vahsak thei na hi hiam?
verses.41: Va-akte a gil kialin leng kawikawi-in, a note in an duhin kei tungah hong nget ciangun, tua va-akte an a pia pa kua ahi hiam?
